name: The Puppets

Introduction:

Three groups of puppets are living peacefully in their cell yard, without a worry in the world. 

However,  the puppets are lively creatures, and their curiosity to the outside world is growing every second.

Sadly, whenever they meet anyone that is not from their own clan, things will go bad. The round headed puppets outside of the walls are trying their best to keep those puppets in their place, but it is just not enough. 

What you need to do is help the round headed puppets, protect those fragile creatures and try your best to maintain the stability of their communities. 

Game Play:

The square headed puppets will try to transform the concave headed puppets into one of their own;

The concave headed puppets will try to transform the sharp headed puppets into one of their own;

The sharp headed puppets will try to transform the square headed puppets into one of their own;

The round headed puppets will try to catch people outside of their wall and send them back.

When puppets are caught too many times or transformed too many times, they will go crazy  (killing others) or dull (stop doing anything) , and eventually get confused about who they are and kill themselves.

You can drag them without your cursor and put them where you want them to be, as long as it will prevent them from doing anything stupid.

PS: 

* You can switch fullscreen/windowed mode with [Alt + Enter] key on Win32 platform.

* Currently the WebGL version has some weird bug when played on fullscreen mode; so please use windowed mode if you want to play it on web
